originalText.text: Advanced Dermatology Office personnel was friendly and courteous!  Dr. Joerg was extremely knowledgeable, rendering excellent and timely service.  Ms. Cynthia Alamo, Dr. Joerg’s Medical Assistant showed compassion regarding my medical condition and follow up.

text.text: Advanced Dermatology Office personnel was friendly and courteous!  Dr. Joerg was extremely knowledgeable, rendering excellent and timely service.  Ms. Cynthia Alamo, Dr. Joerg’s Medical Assistant showed compassion regarding my medical condition and follow up.

originalText.text: Dr. Taglienti is a terrific PS.  He is smart and skilled and caring and honest.  During the procedure, the nurse, Cynthia, was also wonderful and a good partner to Dr. T.  What a great team!!! From my initial consult to the post op I could not have been more pleased.

text.text: Dr. Taglienti is a terrific PS.  He is smart and skilled and caring and honest.  During the procedure, the nurse, Cynthia, was also wonderful and a good partner to Dr. T.  What a great team!!! From my initial consult to the post op I could not have been more pleased.

originalText.text: One of the best experiences I've had with setting up an appointment and seeing a doctor. I was able to secure a same-day appointment with a new doctor at this location. They were very polite, and efficient. The location is easy to get to and Dr. Joerg was very thoughtful, a good listener and engaged. I highly recommend contacting Advanced Dermatology if you're looking for someone who will listen and consider your experiences.

originalText.text:
Dr Joerg is kind and gentle .
I would like to add what is mistakenly left out- my appreciation of Dr Joerg’s assistant, Tish- who prepared me for the exam.
The front office staff - Wesleidy, Kayla, Cynthia, and Emily were
welcoming and kind. The atmosphere of had a feeling of being in a guest house/ hotel, with a wall to wall carpeteding in the waiting room, comfortable chairs and soft light.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Joerg's for over 10 years. She is a joy to work with, and I highly recommend her for her compassion and professionalism. She takes excellent care of my skin!
